title: The Tricky Part (CRS027)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Martin Moran first shared on the podcast in June of 2012, about the sexual abuse he suffered as a child and how it led to his search for healing.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Martin Moran, kevin Allison)
